virtual ~EmlppHandler ()

Detailed Description

The EmlppHandler is a SS handler responsible for modifying the eMlpp SS. This includes registering and interrogating the current status. The handler provides various methods for these purposes.

SsApiRc EmlppHandler::Register (  EmlppPriorityLevel  priority,
const WString &  override_ss_seq = L"",
BOOLEAN  register_only = FALSE
) 
 

Register priority for eMLPP.
Registers the default priority for mobile origintate calls. This method triggers sending of **75n# to the mobile network. The transaction is initiated using the main handler and the resulting tipd is stored along with the parameters.

Parameters:
priority Priority to register at network for outgoing calls, only EmlppPriorityLevel0 to EmlppPriorityLevel4 may be used.
override_ss_seq Supplementary Service request string to be sent to net, overrides handler generated request string.
register_only A flag that indicates if the request is sent to the GSM stack or only registered at SsMainHandler.
Returns:
Any value SsMainHandler::BeginTransaction might return.
See also:
SsMainHandler

SsApiRc EmlppHandler::RequestStatus (  const WString &  override_ss_seq = L"",
BOOLEAN  register_only = FALSE
) 
 

Interrogates the status of eMlpp.
This method triggers sending of *#75# to the mobile network. The transaction is initiated using the main handler and the resulting tipd is stored.

Parameters:
override_ss_seq Supplementary Service request string to be sent to net, overrides handler generated request string.
register_only A flag that indicates if the request is sent to the GSM stack or only registered at SsMainHandler.
Returns:
Any value SsMainHandler::BeginTransaction might return.
See also:
SsMainHandler
